supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgGeneralOne: Corresponding to each position of diamond sponsor will have information about size, duration, a price set by Nextpro. This price includes VAT.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgGeneralTwo: Posted Ads/Logos of suppliers must comply to applicable laws and hold Nextpro harm-less from and against any and all liability, damage and loss (including reasonable legal fees and costs) in-curred as a result of any claim, demand or action by any third party against Nextpro arising from any actual or alleged infringement of any Third Party IP Rights pertaining to posted Ads/Logos of suppliers to Nextpro.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgGeneralThree: Nextpro has full control over the Ads/Logos posted by the suppliers. If any misconduct is detected, offense. And in such cases, Nextpro will not be liable to refund the supplier even if the advertising position is still owned by the supplier.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgGeneralFour: Suppliers must comply to all online Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of Nextpro before posting any Ads/Logos on this platform.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgExplanationOfStatusOne: Occupied: this position is having ads / logos owned from other suppliers along with information about the start date and end date of the position for this ads / logo.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgExplanationOfStatusTwo: Available: this position is without ads / logos and is available for purchase registration.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgExplanationOfStatusThree: Owned: this position belongs to you, along with information about the start date and end date of this position, you can proceed to post ads / logos.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgExplanationOfActionOne: REGISTER TO WAITING LIST: This action button is only applicable when the position is in the Occupied status as mentioned above and you expect to be the next supplier to own this position. When you click on this action button, it will link to the payment page, the system will only confirm that you have registered to successfully own this position when the payment is already completed and with the confirmation of Nextpro.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgExplanationOfActionTwo: BOOKING: This action button is only applicable when the position is in the "Available" status as mentioned above. When you click on this action, it will link to the payment page, the system will only confirm that you have registered to successfully own this position when the payment is already completed and with the confirmation of Nextpro.
supplier-profile-diamond-sponsor.msgExplanationOfActionThree: POSTING: This action button is only applicable when the position is in the "Owned" status as mentioned above. During the time of owning this position (For example, within 3 days from 00:00 01.Mar.2020 to 23.59 03.Mar.2020), Nextpro encourages you to actively post ads / logos on the position you have owned before this position expires.

auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail1: Deposit of auction service fee in percentage
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail2: Please pay attention that this deposit will be only charged when the supplier is awarded.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail3: The step of deposit will be closed right after start of auction.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail5: Supplier is required to pay a deposit for an auction service fee for participant confirmation.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail6: This deposit will be put into NextPro supplier's account in
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail7: app and kept it until an auction awarded.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail8: This auction fee will be charged right after buyer confirmed to award certain supplier(s).
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail9: After buyer awarded supplier, the awarded supplier's account shall be deducted by service fee as per final bid of this supplier, the remaining amount will be refunded to supplier if required.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail10: Rejected suppliers will be gotten back such a deposited amount after awarding by buyer if required.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail11: The percentage of service fees shall be reduced from 3% of final bid amount (if less than 25,000 USD) to 2% of final bid amount (from and above 1,000,000 USD).
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail12: By clicking "Deposit" button, supplier agreed this service fee and NextPro's payment term condition detail; payment will be processed right afterward. Suppliers are responsible to learn E-Auction type on User guide.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail13: By clicking "Refuse" button, supplier are considered that they withdrew this auction and there no service fee charge to suppliers. Buyer can come back and pay a deposit every time they afterward.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail14: Buyer is required to pay a deposit an auction service fee prior e-auction publish.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail15: This deposit will be put into NextPro buyer's account in
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail16: and kept it until an auction awarded.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail17: This deposit will be charged only if buyer cancel an auction results after an auction finished.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail18: After buyer cancelled an auction result, the buyer's account shall be charged the above mentioned deposit.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail19: This deposit of service fee will be gotten back after buyer awarded to certain supplier(s) if required.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail20: The percentage of service fees shall be reduced from 3% of final bid amount (if less than 25,000 USD) to 2% of final bid amount (from and above 1,000,000 USD)
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail21: By clicking "Deposit" button, buyer agreed this deposit and
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail23: the deposit will be processed right afterward.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail24: After buyer completed a deposit step, buyer can publish this auction.
auction-detail.msgAuctionDetail25: By clicking "Refuse" button, the auction will be saved as "Draft version" and there is no service fee charge to buyer. Buyer can come back and pay a deposit every time they afterward.

auction-create-and-detail-header.title: Title
auction-create-and-detail-header.awardOfContract: Award of contract process after E-Auction
auction-create-and-detail-header.startTimeRequired: Live Auction Start Time is required
auction-create-and-detail-header.startTimeQuestionMark: When entering a date, be sure that the start date is reasonable for suppliers' preparation. The default setting is that start date of e auction pluses 5 working days from the published date.
auction-create-and-detail-header.runningTimeQuestionMark: Please define the running time which will be started from live auction start time. Practically, set up greater than 30 mins and less than 120 mins to ensure the connection for all participants.

starting-price-step.tooltipAwarding1: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are equal, award for the lowest bids.
starting-price-step.tooltipAwarding2: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are not equal. The higher technical evaluation will be converted to technical score per maximum 100 scores. Buyer is not obligated to award the contract to the supplier with the lowest price in the auction. Buyer has the option to select who to award the contract to important factors (quality of goods/service in technical evaluation, supplier credit, location may play a roles in buyer's decision). There will not be an automatic of contract once an auction is finished. The award process defined by the buyer applies.
starting-price-step.tooltipAwarding3: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are not equal. The higher technical evaluation will be converted to monetary so-called bonus or malus value. Buyer is not obligated to award the contract to the supplier with the lowest price in the auction. Buyer has the option to select who to award the contract to important factors (quality of goods/service in technical evaluation, supplier credit, location may play a roles in buyer's decision). There will not be an automatic of contract once an auction is finished. The award process defined by the buyer applies.
starting-price-step.awardToMultiSup: Split order to award multiple suppliers
starting-price-step.name: Name
starting-price-step.selectedSupTooltip: All suppliers participating in the auction should have been vetted and qualified. This means that all suppliers at least meet minimum requirement as deemed appropriate by buyer
starting-price-step.startingPriceTooltip: The starting price specifies the maximum bid for the submission of the first bid. Select whether the maximum bid is to be applied for each item or the whole auction. You can enter target prices per item or whole auction in below table
starting-price-step.maxPriceMustNotBeReached: Maximum price must not be reached
starting-price-step.neutralAreaYellowZoneTooltip: The neutral area servers as a intermediate negotiated target, which denotes the yellow light to supplier. Supplier could know has nearly reach the target price. Recommended: target price + 10% - 20%. Setting the best bid starting with yellow light, let other competitors in red light. Neutral area not to be fixed too tight will be let supplier' demotivation
starting-price-step.targetPriceTooltip: The target price per auction serves as a negotiated target. It can be displayed or hidden to all suppliers. Recommended: should not be displayed in Price and Ranking auction (supplier might stop submitting further bid).
starting-price-step.minimumBidStepTooltip: Defines the minimum difference between bids. Prevents that too narrow bids are submitted. Recommended: 0.25% to 0.5% of the target price. Smaller steps allow flexibility at the end of the auction.
starting-price-step.maximumBidStepTooltip: Defines the maximum distance between two bids. As a rules, supplier could not adjust their bid which is higher than previous bid. During live auction, the supplier will receive a warning he has to confirm to still submit this bid. This prevents that a supplier enters a too low bid by mistake or other reasons.
starting-price-step.deleteSupNoti: The amount of suppliers must be at least 1
starting-price-step.initialPriceLessThanEndPrice: Initial Price Must Be Less Than End Price
starting-price-step.initialPriceGreaterThanEndPrice: Initial Price Must Be Greater Than End Price
starting-price-step.priceStepLessThanEndPrice: Price Step Must Be Less Than End Price
starting-price-step.priceStepLessThanInitialPrice: Price Step Must Be Less Than Initial Price
starting-price-step.neutralAreaYellowZoneRequired: Neutral Area Yellow Zone is required
starting-price-step.targetPriceLessThanStartingPrice: The target price must be less than the starting price
starting-price-step.neutralAreaLessThanStartingPrice: The Neutral area yellow line  price must be less than the starting price
starting-price-step.minimumBidLessThanStartingPrice: The minimum bid difference must be less than the starting price
starting-price-step.targetPriceLessThanNeutralArea: The target price must be below the Neutral area yellow line
starting-price-step.minimumBidLessThanNeutralArea: The minimum bid difference has to be smaller than the neural area yellow line
starting-price-step.minimumBidLessThanTargetPrice: The minimum bid difference has to be smaller than the target price
starting-price-step.noBidPossible: No bids are possible with these values for min. and max. bid difference. Select a smaller value for the min. bid difference or a larger value for the max. bid difference

price-setting-step.bidderUnderBestBid: Bidder must under the best bid
price-setting-step.bidderUnderHimselfTooltip: Bidder submit the bid under bid themselves in the live auction.
price-setting-step.bidderUnderBestBidTooltip: Bidder have to submit underbid the currently the best bid amongst bidder in the live auction.
price-setting-step.typeBidMinitoringTooltip: Bidders see his position means that he recognizes which rank he actually on. Bidders see all previous bids means that he can see the chart and all other bids
price-setting-step.onlySeeHisRank: Only best bidder can see his rank
price-setting-step.otherBidVisibleBeforeSubmission: Other bids are visible before submission of an initial bid
price-setting-step.suppliersInviDuringAuction: Suppliers are invisible to the buyer during the auction
price-setting-step.viewCompetitorInfor: Competitor's information is hidden to all bidders
price-setting-step.viewCompetitorInforTooltip: The competitor's information will be shutdown for the entire duration of live auction
price-setting-step.auctionExtensionTooltip: Some bidders may use the strategy to submit bids during the last few minutes of their action. It is possible to set up an automatic extension. To do this, please define the extension rules for this auction
price-setting-step.auctionControlledTooltip: Bidder submit the bid under bid themselves in the live auction.
price-setting-step.autoExtensionTooltip: Description given from buyer. Buyer define the auction rule to all suppliers.
price-setting-step.supInvisibleBuyer: Suppliers are invisible to the buyer
price-setting-step.minutesLessThanRunningTime: Minites must be less than Running Time
price-setting-step.rankingsLessThanTotalSups: Rankings value must be less than total suppliers

starting-price-step.tooltipAwarding1: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are equal, award for the lowest bids.
starting-price-step.tooltipAwarding2: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are not equal. The higher technical evaluation will be converted to technical score per maximum 100 scores. Buyer is not obligated to award the contract to the supplier with the lowest price in the auction. Buyer has the option to select who to award the contract to important factors (quality of goods/service in technical evaluation, supplier credit, location may play a roles in buyer's decision). There will not be an automatic of contract once an auction is finished. The award process defined by the buyer applies.
starting-price-step.tooltipAwarding3: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are not equal. The higher technical evaluation will be converted to monetary so-called bonus or malus value. Buyer is not obligated to award the contract to the supplier with the lowest price in the auction. Buyer has the option to select who to award the contract to important factors (quality of goods/service in technical evaluation, supplier credit, location may play a roles in buyer's decision). There will not be an automatic of contract once an auction is finished. The award process defined by the buyer applies.

starting-price-step.minimumBidStepTooltip: Defines the minimum difference between bids. Prevents that too narrow bids are submitted. Recommended: 0.25% to 0.5% of the target price. Smaller steps allow flexibility at the end of the auction.
starting-price-step.maximumBidStepTooltip: Defines the maximum distance between two bids. As a rules, supplier could not adjust their bid which is higher than previous bid. createEAuction.processFlow: The process flow will guide you through each process step. It informs the completed step(s) and next. Please always ensure that you save all input data periodically.
createEAuction.liveAuctionStartTime: When entering a date, be sure that the start date is reasonable for suppliers' preparation. The default setting is that start date of e-auction pluses 5 working days from the published date.
createEAuction.runningTime: Please define the running time which will be started from live auction start time. Practically, set up greater than 30 mins and less than 120 mins to ensure the connection for all participants.
createEAuction.lowestPriceAward: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are equal, award for the lowest bids.
createEAuction.technicalCommercialAward: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are not equal. The higher technical evaluation will be converted to technical score per maximum 100 scores. Buyer is not obligated to award the contract to the supplier with the lowest price in the auction. Buyer has the option to select who to award the contract to important factors (quality of goods/service in technical evaluation, supplier credit, location may play a roles in buyer's decision). There will not be an automatic of contract once an auction is finished. The award process defined by the buyer applies.
createEAuction.technicalAdvantagesConvertToMonetary: Technical weighting amongst suppliers are not equal. The higher technical evaluation will be converted to monetary so-called bonus or malus value. Buyer is not obligated to award the contract to the supplier with the lowest price in the auction. Buyer has the option to select who to award the contract to important factors (quality of goods/service in technical evaluation, supplier credit, location may play a roles in buyer's decision). There will not be an automatic of contract once an auction is finished. The award process defined by the buyer applies.
createEAuction.selectedSuppliers: All suppliers participating in the auction should have been vetted and qualified. This means that all suppliers at least meet minimum requirement as deemed appropriate by buyer.
createEAuction.startingPrices: The starting price specifies the maximum bid for the submission of the first bid. Select whether the maximum bid is to be applied for each item or the whole auction. You can enter target prices per item or whole auction in below table.
createEAuction.neutralAreaYellowZone: The neutral area servers as a intermediate negotiated target, which denotes the yellow light to supplier. Supplier could know has nearly reach the target price. Recommended: target price + 10% - 20%. Setting the best bid starting with yellow light, let other competitors in red light. Neutral area not to be fixed too tight will be let supplier' demotivation.
createEAuction.targetPrice: The target price per auction serves as a negotiated target . It can be displayed or hidden to all suppliers. Recommended: should not be displayed in Price and Ranking auction (supplier might stop submitting further bid).
createEAuction.minimumBidStep: Defines the minimum difference between bids. Prevents that too narrow bids are submitted. Recommended: 0.25% to 0.5% of the target price. Smaller steps allow flexibility at the end of the auction.
createEAuction.maximumBidStep: Defines the maximum distance between two bids. As a rules, supplier could not adjust their bid which is higher than previous bid. During live auction, the supplier will receive a warning he has to confirm to still submit this bid. This prevents that a supplier enters a too low bid by mistake or other reasons.
createEAuction.bidderMustUnderBidHimself: Bidder submit the bid under bid themselves in the live auction.
createEAuction.bidderMustUnderTheBestBid: Bidder have to submit underbid the currently the best bid amongst bidder in the live auction.
createEAuction.typeOfBidMonitoring: Bidders see his position means that he recognizes which rank he actually on. Bidders see all previous bids means that he can see the chart and all other bids.
createEAuction.competitorInformationIsHiddenToAllBidder: The competitor's information will be shutdown for the entire duration of live auction.
createEAuction.auctionExtension: Some bidders may use the strategy to submit bids during the last few minutes of their action. It is possible to set up an automatic extension. To do this, please define the extension rules for this auction.
createEAuction.auctionIsControlledByBuyer: The auction extension will be not possible. The supplier will receive a warning if 0 bids submitted before the predefined minutes before end of auction.
createEAuction.auctionRulesFromBuyer: Description given from buyer. Buyer define the auction rule to all suppliers.
